entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
